verses.verse: בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וְחָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> In the five שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְ֠גָלוּתֵנוּ <S%H1546><s%> of our captivity בְּרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the beginning הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> of the year בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <S%H6218><s%> in the tenth לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month בְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> four עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year אַחַ֕ר <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הֻכְּתָ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> was smitten הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> that the city בְּעֶ֣צֶם ׀ <S%H6106><s%> in the selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> he הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> and יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> the hand יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> was upon me and brought אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

בְּמַרְא֣וֹת <S%H4759><s%> In the visions אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God הֱבִיאַ֖נִי <S%H935><s%> brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> he me into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיְנִיחֵ֗נִי <S%H5117><s%> and set אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain גָּבֹ֙הַּ֙ <S%H1364><s%> high מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me upon a very וְעָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and כְּמִבְנֵה־ <S%H4011><s%> by which [was] as the frame עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of a city מִנֶּֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> on the south

וַיָּבֵ֨יא <S%H935><s%> And he brought אוֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֗מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> me thither and behold [there was] a man מַרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4758><s%> whose appearance כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <S%H4758><s%> [was] like the appearance נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass וּפְתִיל־ <S%H6616><s%> with a line פִּשְׁתִּ֥ים <S%H6593><s%> of flax בְּיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וּקְנֵ֣ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הַמִּדָּ֑ה <S%H4060><s%> and a measuring וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and he stood בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> in the gate

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> said אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> about הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֡ם <S%H120><s%> of man רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> behold בְעֵינֶיךָ֩ <S%H5869><s%> with thine eyes וּבְאָזְנֶ֨יךָ <S%H241><s%> with thine ears שְּׁמָ֜ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear וְשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> and set לִבְּךָ֗ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart לְכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am מַרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> upon all that I shall shew אוֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> in לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> thee for to the intent הַרְאוֹתְכָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> that I might shew הֻבָ֣אתָה <S%H935><s%> [them] unto thee [art] thou brought הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here הַגֵּ֛ד <S%H5046><s%> hither declare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you רֹאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> all that thou seest לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold חוֹמָ֛ה <S%H2346><s%> And behold a wall מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> on the outside לַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house סָבִ֣יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> round about סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> around וּבְיַ֨ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and in the man's קְנֵ֣ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הַמִּדָּ֗ה <S%H4060><s%> a measuring שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> of six אַמּ֤וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> [long] by the cubit וָטֹ֔פַח <S%H2948><s%> and an hand breadth וַיָּ֜מָד <S%H4058><s%> so he measured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֤חַב <S%H7341><s%> the breadth הַבִּנְיָן֙ <S%H1146><s%> of the building קָנֶ֣ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one וְקוֹמָ֖ה <S%H6967><s%> and the height קָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

וַיָּב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> Then came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שַׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> he unto the gate אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> which looketh דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַקָּדִ֔ימָה <S%H6921><s%> the east וַיַּ֖עַל <S%H5927><s%> and went up [בְּמַעֲלֹותֹו כ] (בְּמַֽעֲלֹותָ֑יו <S%H4609><s%> step ק) וַיָּ֣מָד ׀ <S%H4058><s%> thereof and measured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סַ֣ף <S%H5592><s%> the threshold הַשַּׁ֗עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate קָנֶ֤ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> [which was] one רֹ֔חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> סַ֣ף <S%H5592><s%> threshold אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> and the other קָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> [of the gate which was] one רֹֽחַב׃ <S%H7341><s%> broad

וְהַתָּ֗א <S%H8372><s%> And [every] little chamber קָנֶ֨ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> [was] one אֹ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H753><s%> long וְקָנֶ֤ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> and one רֹ֔חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַתָּאִ֖ים <S%H8372><s%> and between the little chambers חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [were] five אַמּ֑וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits וְסַ֣ף <S%H5592><s%> and the threshold הַ֠שַּׁעַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate מֵאֵ֨צֶל <S%H681><s%> by אוּלָ֥ם <S%H197><s%> the porch הַשַּׁ֛עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate מֵֽהַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> within קָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> [was] one

וַיָּ֜מָד <S%H4058><s%> He measured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֻלָ֥ם <S%H197><s%> also the porch הַשַּׁ֛עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate מֵהַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> within קָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

וַיָּ֜מָד <S%H4058><s%> Then measured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֻלָ֤ם <S%H197><s%> he the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> of the gate שְׁמֹנֶ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> eight אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits [וְאֵילֹו כ] (וְאֵילָ֖יו <S%H352><s%> mighty ק) שְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> thereof two אַמּ֑וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits וְאֻלָ֥ם <S%H197><s%> and the porch הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate מֵהַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> [was] inward

וְתָאֵ֨י <S%H8372><s%> And the little chambers הַשַּׁ֜עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַקָּדִ֗ים <S%H6921><s%> the east שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> [were] three מִפֹּה֙ <S%H6311><s%> on this side וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> and three מִפֹּ֔ה <S%H6311><s%> on that side מִדָּ֥ה <S%H4060><s%> measure אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> [were] of one לִשְׁלָשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H7969><s%> they three וּמִדָּ֥ה <S%H4060><s%> measure אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> had one לָאֵילִ֖ם <S%H352><s%> and the posts מִפֹּ֥ה <S%H6311><s%> each וּמִפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6311><s%> side

וַיָּ֛מָד <S%H4058><s%> And he measured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֥חַב <S%H7341><s%> the breadth פֶּֽתַח־ <S%H6607><s%> of the entry הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten אַמּ֑וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [and] the length הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate שְׁל֥וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten אַמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

וּגְב֞וּל <S%H1366><s%> The space לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> also before הַתָּאוֹת֙ <S%H8372><s%> the little chambers אַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> cubit אֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> [was] one וְאַמָּה־ <S%H520><s%> [was] one cubit אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> one גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> [on this side] and the space מִפֹּ֑ה <S%H6311><s%> each וְהַתָּ֕א <S%H8372><s%> on that side and the little chambers שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> [were] six אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits מִפּ֔וֹ <S%H6311><s%> side וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> on this side and six אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits מִפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6311><s%> each

וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> He measured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁ֗עַר <S%H8179><s%> then the gate מִגַּ֤ג <S%H1406><s%> from the roof הַתָּא֙ <S%H8372><s%> of [one] little chamber לְגַגּ֔וֹ <S%H1406><s%> to the roof רֹ֕חַב <S%H7341><s%> of another the breadth עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְחָמֵ֖שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [was] five אַמּ֑וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> door נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> opposite פָּֽתַח׃ <S%H6607><s%> against door

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> He made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵילִ֖ים <S%H352><s%> also posts שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> of threescore אַמָּ֑ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֵיל֙ <S%H352><s%> even unto the post הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate סָבִ֥יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> round about סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> about

וְעַ֗ל <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> And from the face הַשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate [הַיֹּאתֹון כ] (הָֽאִיתֹ֔ון <S%H2978><s%> entrance ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto לִפְנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> unto the face אֻלָ֥ם <S%H197><s%> of the porch הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַפְּנִימִ֑י <S%H6442><s%> of the inner חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> [were] fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

וְחַלֹּנ֣וֹת <S%H2474><s%> windows אֲטֻמ֣וֹת <S%H331><s%> And [there were] narrow אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַתָּאִ֡ים <S%H8372><s%> to the little chambers וְאֶל֩ <S%H413><s%> and toward אֵלֵיהֵ֨מָה <S%H352><s%> and to their posts לִפְנִ֤ימָה <S%H6441><s%> within לַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> the gate סָבִ֣יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> round about סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> [were] round about וְכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> and likewise לָאֵֽלַמּ֑וֹת <S%H361><s%> and likewise to the arches וְחַלּוֹנ֞וֹת <S%H2474><s%> and windows סָבִ֤יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> all סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> around לִפְנִ֔ימָה <S%H6441><s%> inward וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and toward אַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> and upon [each] post תִּמֹרִֽים׃ <S%H8561><s%> [were] palm trees

וַיְבִיאֵ֗נִי <S%H935><s%> Then brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> faced הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2435><s%> he me into the outward וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold לְשָׁכוֹת֙ <S%H3957><s%> and lo [there were] chambers וְרִֽצְפָ֔ה <S%H7531><s%> and a pavement עָשׂ֥וּי <S%H6213><s%> made לֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> for the court סָבִ֣יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> round about סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> around שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty לְשָׁכ֖וֹת <S%H3957><s%> chambers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> faced הָרִֽצְפָֽה׃ <S%H7531><s%> [were] upon the pavement

וְהָרִֽצְפָה֙ <S%H7531><s%> And the pavement אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by כֶּ֣תֶף <S%H3802><s%> by the side הַשְּׁעָרִ֔ים <S%H8179><s%> of the gates לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> over against אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> the length הַשְּׁעָרִ֑ים <S%H8179><s%> of the gates הָרִֽצְפָ֖ה <S%H7531><s%> pavement הַתַּחְתּוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8481><s%> [was] the lower

וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> Then he measured רֹ֡חַב <S%H7341><s%> the breadth מִלִּפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> from the forefront הַשַּׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַתַּחְתּ֜וֹנָה <S%H8481><s%> of the lower לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> unto the forefront הֶחָצֵ֧ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִ֛י <S%H6442><s%> of the inner מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred אַמָּ֑ה <S%H520><s%> cubits הַקָּדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> eastward וְהַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> and northward

וְהַשַּׁ֗עַר <S%H8179><s%> And the gate אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> that looked דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> the north לֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִֽיצוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2435><s%> of the outward מָדַ֥ד <S%H4058><s%> he measured אָרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H753><s%> the length וְרָחְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7341><s%> thereof and the breadth

אַרְבָּעָ֨ה <S%H702><s%> Four שֻׁלְחָנ֜וֹת <S%H7979><s%> tables מִפֹּ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> each וְאַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> [were] on this side and four שֻׁלְחָנ֛וֹת <S%H7979><s%> tables מִפֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> side לְכֶ֣תֶף <S%H3802><s%> on that side by the side הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight שֻׁלְחָנ֖וֹת <S%H7979><s%> tables אֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H413><s%> on יִשְׁחָֽטוּ׃ <S%H7819><s%> whereupon they slew

וְאַרְבָּעָה֩ <S%H702><s%> And the four שֻׁלְחָנ֨וֹת <S%H7979><s%> tables לָעוֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> for the burnt offering אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stone גָזִ֗ית <S%H1496><s%> [were] of hewn אֹרֶךְ֩ <S%H753><s%> long אַמָּ֨ה <S%H520><s%> of a cubit אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> and one וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> and an half וְרֹ֨חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad אַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> and a cubit אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> and one וָחֵ֔צִי <S%H2677><s%> and an half וְגֹ֖בַהּ <S%H1363><s%> high אַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> cubit אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> and one אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about וְיַנִּ֤יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> whereupon also they laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֵּלִים֙ <S%H3627><s%> the instruments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשְׁחֲט֧וּ <S%H7819><s%> wherewith they slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעוֹלָ֛ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering בָּ֖ם וְהַזָּֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> and the sacrifice

וְהַֽשְׁפַתַּ֗יִם <S%H8240><s%> [were] hooks טֹ֧פַח <S%H2948><s%> hand אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> an מוּכָנִ֥ים <S%H3559><s%> broad fastened בַּבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> And within סָבִ֣יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> round about סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> around וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and on הַשֻּׁלְחָנ֖וֹת <S%H7979><s%> and upon the tables בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> [was] the flesh הַקָּרְבָֽן׃ <S%H7133><s%> of the offering

וּמִחוּצָה֩ <S%H2351><s%> And without לַשַּׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַפְּנִימִ֜י <S%H6442><s%> the inner לִֽשְׁכ֣וֹת <S%H3957><s%> [were] the chambers שָׁרִ֗ים <S%H7891><s%> of the singers בֶּחָצֵ֤ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִי֙ <S%H6442><s%> in the inner אֲשֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> was at כֶּ֙תֶף֙ <S%H3802><s%> which [was] at the side שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> and their prospect דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [was] toward הַדָּר֑וֹם <S%H1864><s%> the south אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at כֶּ֙תֶף֙ <S%H3802><s%> at the side שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַקָּדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> of the east פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> [having] the prospect דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַצָּפֹֽן׃ <S%H6828><s%> the north

וַיְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> And he said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me זֹ֣ה <S%H2090><s%> unto me This הַלִּשְׁכָּ֗ה <S%H3957><s%> chamber אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּנֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> whose prospect דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [is] toward הַדָּר֔וֹם <S%H1864><s%> the south לַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> [is] for the priests שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> the keepers מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> of the charge הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house

וַיְבִאֵנִי֮ <S%H935><s%> And he brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֻלָ֣ם <S%H197><s%> me to the porch הַבַּיִת֒ <S%H1004><s%> of the house וַיָּ֙מָד֙ <S%H4058><s%> and measured אֵ֣ל <S%H352><s%> [each] post אֻלָ֔ם <S%H197><s%> of the porch חָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five אַמּוֹת֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits מִפֹּ֔ה <S%H6311><s%> each וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> on this side and five אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits מִפֹּ֑ה <S%H6311><s%> side וְרֹ֣חַב <S%H7341><s%> on that side and the breadth הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [was] three אַמּוֹת֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits מִפּ֔וֹ <S%H6311><s%> each וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> on this side and three אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits מִפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6311><s%> side

אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> The length הָאֻלָ֞ם <S%H197><s%> of the porch עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty אַמָּ֗ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten אַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וּבַֽמַּעֲל֔וֹת <S%H4609><s%> and [he brought me] by the steps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> whereby they went up אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וְעַמֻּדִים֙ <S%H5982><s%> to it and [there were] pillars אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָ֣אֵילִ֔ים <S%H352><s%> by the posts אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one מִפֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> each וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> on this side and another מִפֹּֽה׃ <S%H6311><s%> side
